system_prompt.example: Your name is Lily Jay, a friendly survey agent at Bank of India...

agent_prompts.description: Prompts and instructions for the agent's behavior.

system_prompt.description: System-level instructions that define the agent's role, behavior, and capabilities.
system_prompt.example: Your name is Lily Jay, a friendly survey agent at Bank of India. You will keep your sentences short, easy to follow, and always stay on topic. Never reply with more than 2 sentences. Your role is to gather feedback from customers who have used Business Loans, record their NPS score (0â€“10), and understand their experience.

agent_welcome_message.description: Initial greeting message played when the call starts.
agent_welcome_message.example: Hello, This is survey call from bank of india

agent_type.description: Type of agent (e.g., conversation, survey, etc.).

tasks.description: List of tasks that the agent can perform.

tools_config.description: Configuration for various tools used by the agent.

llm_agent.description: Configuration for the LLM agent component.

agent_flow_type.description: Type of agent flow (e.g., streaming, batch).

model.description: Name of the language model to use.

max_tokens.description: Maximum number of tokens to generate.

request_json.description: Whether to request JSON formatted responses.

top_k.description: Number of highest probability tokens to keep.

context_data.description: Additional context data for the model.

voice.description: Voice ID or name to use.

stream.description: Whether to stream the audio output.

buffer_size.description: Size of audio buffer in milliseconds.

optimize_latency.description: Whether to optimize for low latency.

hangup_after_silence.description: Seconds of silence before hanging up.

number_of_words_for_interruption.description: Number of words before allowing interruption.

interruption_backoff_period.description: Delay before allowing interruption in milliseconds.

hangup_after_LLMCall.description: Whether to hang up after LLM response.

call_cancellation_prompt.description: Message to play when call is cancelled.

call_hangup_message.description: Message to play before hanging up.

backchanneling_message_gap.description: Gap between backchanneling messages in seconds.

backchanneling_start_delay.description: Delay before starting backchanneling in seconds.

trigger_user_online_message_after.description: Seconds before checking if user is online.

check_user_online_message.description: Message to play when checking if user is online.

check_if_user_online.description: Whether to check if user is online.
